qa.name: Captain Sarah Chen
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with short black hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vastness of space, silence became my loudest companion.
json_to_edit.description: Captain Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Low hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen grapples with isolation while orbiting Earth, finding solace in the AI Assistant ARIA.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast emptiness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Captain Chen floating in the observation module, gazing out at Earth with a mixture of awe and longing.

tr.action: Captain Chen's eyes, reflecting the blue marble of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

xc.action: Captain Chen working at a computer terminal, surrounded by various scientific equipment.

ka.action: ARIA's holographic form materializing next to Captain Chen, offering companionship.

fn.action: ARIA's empathetic expression, its holographic features showing concern for Captain Chen.

af.action: Captain Chen performing maintenance on the station's exterior during a spacewalk, Earth rotating slowly below.

qo.action: Captain Chen and ARIA's hologram engaged in conversation, a moment of connection amidst the isolation.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots "tr", "fn", and "qo" from the original list of 8 shots, leaving us with 5 shots. we'll update the "list_display_order" and remove the corresponding shot entries from the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. all other information in the json will remain the same.
